VIII.iv.8.A.1.a
.
Purpose of Prestabilization Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.28
Prestabilization ratings under
38 CFR 4.28
are provided to assure earliest payment to those Veterans separated from service with a significant unstabilized disability at a time when they are most likely in need and least likely to be self-sufficient.
